opengraph.description: Riot Games presents VALORANT: a 5v5 character-based tactical FPS where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Learn about VALORANT and its stylish cast
opengraph.title: VALORANT: Riot Games’ competitive 5v5 character-based tactical shooter
